attributes.action: Add India in red list for travel ban
attributes.additional_details:
We request Government to add India in red list countries for travel as there are more increase in COVID daily cases. Our country is already suffering from sever affects of pandemic. We do not want another national lockdown. 

Take Action before it’s too late.
attributes.background:
We do not want to go in Lockdown again, we want you to take action before it’s too late.

Public Health England says 73 cases of the variant first identified in India have been found in England, and four in Scotland.
